imdb.title: Kuroshitsuji
imdb.plot: Ciel Phantomhive takes care of the many unsettling events in Victorian England. Aided by Sebastian Michaelis, his loyal butler with seemingly inhuman abilities. But is there more to this black-clad butler than meets the eye?

episodes.title: Kuro Shitsuji
episodes.plot: Devilish butler Claude and his Young Master, Alois, must outfox a viscount, a priest, and an uncle with an eye on the family fortune. However; Sebastian and Ciel Phantomhive make their reappearance in only a Black Butler fashion.

episodes.title: Soroshitsuji
episodes.plot: Ciel and Sebastian accompany Lady Elizabeth on a hunt for a white stag. The stag is actually a Mysterious creature foretold to grant eternal happiness. Of course, a disaster of some kind falls upon the Young Master and his devoted servant.

episodes.title: Meroshitsuji
episodes.plot: "Wench Butler" -- When young brides all over London are being burned alive, The Young Master and Sebastian begin to investigate. What is the connection between the burned brides, a photographer's studio, and an old nemesis? The dynamic duo must find it before the city goes up in smoke.

episodes.title: Teroshitsuji
episodes.plot: "Terrorist Butler" -- A mummy, a bomb, a prisoner assassin being transported, and an outbreak of cholera complicate the Young Master and Sebastian's rescue mission to save the kidnapped son of a nobleman. Also, who are the strangers on the train who come to their aid? Sebastian meets Claude once again who invites him and the Young Master to a costume ball at the Trancy estate.

episodes.title: Noroshitsuji
episodes.plot: "Beacon Butler" -- It is known to all but the Young Master that he lost his memory. Sebastian has asked of all who know Ciel to act as if everything is the same; although harder for some. However, when in attendance at the Trancy estate costume ball memories, feelings, tears and familiar faces may force a reversal. Ciel is threatened by Alois and the two young masters set their butlers of their leashes for a fight to remember.

episodes.title: Yoroshitsuji
episodes.plot: When a demonic instrument wreaks havoc at the ball, Sebastian uses his unusual musical talent to set the mood for a party. Later in the evening, he takes to the water in a butler against butler battle for his young master's soul.

episodes.title: Koroshitsuji
episodes.plot: The "dance of death" is the scheduled entertainment when Sebastian and Ciel attend a private affair at the Trancy estate, and only teatime can persuade the butlers to lay down their weapons and stop the bloodshed.

episodes.title: Toroshitsuji
episodes.plot: A series of haunting flashbacks revisit the tragic events of the night Claude and Alois first met. As their story unfolds, a devilish partnership is forged, and their unholy interest in Sebastian and Ciel is finally explained!

episodes.title: Uroshitsuji
episodes.plot: The appearance of a new grim reaper leads to various mix-ups, and a string of mysterious eye-gougings plagues London. Sebastian and his Young Master suspect different culprits, but Ciel might not be around long enough to investigate!

episodes.title: Zeroshitsuji
episodes.plot: Sebastian must devise a way to reclaim Ciel without violating his Young Master's orders. It is a perilous mission that will require every ounce of the dashing butler's strength and cunning - and perhaps a scandalous pose or two.

episodes.title: Kiroshitsuji
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Kuroshitsuji
episodes.plot: Hannah's devious game of deception forces Sebastian and Claude to agree to the unthinkable: a demon verses demon duel where only one butler emerges victorious!

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, yuunou
episodes.plot: His Butler, Able --- Earl Ciel Phantomhive and his butler Sebastian Michaelis prepare for a visit from Damian, the head of Funtom Company.

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, saikyou
episodes.plot: His Butler, Strongest -- Earl Ciel Phantomhive is kidnapped for ransom by a drug dealer named Azzurro Vanel, who is also the leader of an Italian mafia, and Sebastian comes to rescue his young master.

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, bannou
episodes.plot: "His Butler, Omnipotent" --- When the Young Master's fiancee drops by for an unannounced visit, the Phantomhive Estate experiences a sickening outbreak of "cuteness". Meanwhile, the Butler has his hands full with a suicidal apprentice.

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, suikyou
episodes.plot: His Butler, Capricious -- The Young Master dons an evening gown to apprehend a monster who's been butchering women of the night, but if his talent for cross-dressing is discovered, the Phantomhive name will be irreversibly sullied.

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, kaikou
episodes.plot: His Butler, Chance Encounter -- The Butler and his Young Master scour the seedy back alleys of London in search of an infamous butcher. Imagine their surprise upon discovering that the ripper may actually be a reaper.

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, sousou
episodes.plot: His Butler, At the Funeral -- Sebastian continues his gruesome battle with the rogue reaper, and the Young Master takes special care to make sure his beloved aunt his buried in her proper colors.

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, yuukyou
episodes.plot: "His Butler, Merrymaking" -- At the Queen's request, the Young Master and his companions travel to an island said to be haunted by a demon dog. Sebastian is a little hesitant seeing as he's been more of a cat person...demon.

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, choukyou
episodes.plot: "His Butler, Training" -- The Young Master, Sebastian, and others encounter the demonic hound, Pluto, whom they soon find out can change into human form. Angela request that The Young Master bring him home to the Phantomhive estate and Sebastian is ordered to train him.

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, genzou
episodes.plot: "His Butler, Phantom Image" -- The Young Master commands the three servants to take a photo of Sebastian with a camera with mystical abilities. Sebastian avoids each attempt effortlessly and in the end is the one to take the picture of Young Master.

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, hikami
episodes.plot: "His Butler, On Ice" -- Sebastian takes up ice sculpting to wins the prize, a stunning but cursed ring. The outcome is unexpected.

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, ikasama
episodes.plot: "His Butler, However You Please" -- The Young Master and Sebastian travel to London to investigate the abduction of his betrothed by Drocell a walking and talking marionette. But who is the actual Puppeteer?

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, sekiryou
episodes.plot: "His Butler, Forlorn" -- The Young Master's birthday is overshadowed while Elizabeth is still in danger. The Puppeteer is terrorizing London with his collections of marionettes. London bridge is falling down, falling down.

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, isourou
episodes.plot: "His Butler, Freeloader" -- An Indian prince visits the Phantomhive estate with his own remarkable butler in tow. This butler gives Sebastian an unexpected competitor in the competition.

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, inou
episodes.plot: Prince Soma has been betrayed by his manservant, and the Butler must put his hellish talents to the test in a curry-cooking competition against the blessed right hand of an Indian deity.

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, kyousou
episodes.plot: The Queen is on hand as the Butler wages culinary warfare against Prince Soma's royal servant. The competition reaches an unprecedented level of ferocity when someone's secret ingredient unleashes the demon god of curry.

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, kojou
episodes.plot: When the Young Master is defeated in a supernatural chess match, he must surrender his most prized possession to a ghostly prince. Locating a very old and very specific skull is the key to bringing Sebastian back.

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, hounou
episodes.plot: The Queen orders young Master Phantomhive to investigate reports of a cult that promises to "purify" its unclean members. The mission is complicated by the appearance of a familiar reaper.

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, tensou
episodes.plot: An angel abducts Ciel and attempts to rewrite his unhappy memories of the past. The Butler is powerless to assist, but fortunately, the Young Master has an unhealthy attachment to his hatred.

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, jurou
episodes.plot: There's a potent new drug plaguing the backstreets of London, and it's being sold in stolen Phantomhive candy wrappers. The Young Master is being set up, but what manner of man wants him to take the fall?

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, datsugoku
episodes.plot: While the Young Master continues his investigation into the opium-filled, counterfeit candy wrappers, the Butler is chained and tortured in the Tower of London.

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, koyou
episodes.plot: "His Butler, Recruiting" -- The backgrounds of Mey-Rin, Bardroy, and Finnian are revealed in a series of flashbacks. Mey-Rin was a sniper for hire, being asked to assassinate politicians. Bardroy was a soldier in the military, being the only survivor in his unit. Finnian was an imprisoned human test subject, being given superhuman strength. Elizabeth asks Ciel to teach her how to play chess until sundown.

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, kaishou
episodes.plot: The Young Master's journey to Paris leads to another showdown with the Queen's angelic butler and a painful parting of the ways with someone dear to his heart. Can Ceil survive without the demonic assistance he's grown so accustomed to?

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, enjou
episodes.plot: "His Butler, Up In Flames" -- The Young Master stows away to make his return to London, only to find the city engulfed in flames. It's revealed that Angela and Ashe are merged together as one angel. When Ciel tries to talk to the Queen the unfathomable happens. Will his butler come to his aid?

episodes.title: Sono shitsuji, toutou
episodes.plot: "His Butler, Fluent" -- Reunited with his Butler, the Young Master gives a kill order. Along with Sebastian and the others the destruction of London comes to an end. However, the end has also come for the Young Master, Ciel Phantomhive, or has it?

episodes.title: Sono Shitsuji, Kôgyô
episodes.plot: Ciel and Sebastian celebrate the third anniversary of Funtom Company by hosting Hamlet as the play for an orphan charity. However, all the actors hired to perform in the play cannot arrive due to a shipwreck. Since the play cannot be postponed, Sebastian is ordered by Ciel to make the play a success regardless. Sebastian rallies up the whole group together to be in the play. Though the plot was ultimately altered, the play turns out, for the most part, a success with a valuable lesson about revenge attached.
